Name: Berry Blast
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprig & lemon slice.
Review: As the name suggests this non-alcoholic long drink is loaded with berry fruit, presented over the light tannins of a black tea base with a splash of passion fruit syrup adding flavour and a hint of balancing sweetness.
History: Adapted from a drink created at Jamie's Italian Bars.
